quiz:

XML uses a DTD to describe the data
XML uses XSL to describe data

XML's goal is to replace HTML

Yes

All XML elements must be lower case
All XML elements must be properly closed

XML documents must have a root tag

XML preserves white spaces

True

Attributes must always be present
Attributes must occur in defined order
None of the other two statements are true

Entities define shortcuts to standard elements
Entities define shortcuts to standard attributes
Entities define shortcuts to standard text or special characters
Entities define shortcuts to standard text or special characters
What is an XML instance?
An XML attribute
An XML element
An XML document
An XML document

The nodeList object
The node object
The document object

True

How do you write "Hello World" in an alert box?
msgBox("Hello World");
alert("Hello World");
alertBox("Hello World");
alert("Hello World");
How do you create a function in JavaScript?
function = myFunction()
function:myFunction()
function myFunction()
function myFunction()
How do you call a function named "myFunction"?
call function myFunction()
call myFunction()
myFunction()
myFunction()
How to write an IF statement in JavaScript?
if i = 5
if (i == 5)
if i == 5 then
if (i == 5)
How to write an IF statement for executing some code if "i" is NOT equal to 5?
if (i != 5)
if i =! 5 then
if i !== 5
if (i != 5)
How does a WHILE loop start?
while i = 1 to 10
while (i <= 10)
while (i <= 10 ;i++)
while (i <= 10)
How does a FOR loop start?
for (i = 0; i <= 5)
for i = 1 to 5
for (i = 0; i <= 5; i++)
for (i = 0; i <= 5; i++)
How can you add a comment in a JavaScript?
//This is a comment
'This is a comment
(!This is a comment)
//This is a comment
What is the correct way to write a JavaScript array?
var colors = "red", "green", "blue"
var colors = (1:"red", 2:"green", 3:"blue")
var colors = ["red", "green", "blue"]
var colors = ["red", "green", "blue"]
How do you round the number 7.25, to the nearest integer?
Math.round(7.25)
rnd(7.25)
Math.rnd(7.25)
Math.round(7.25)
How do you find the number with the highest value of x and y?
Math.max(x, y)
top(x, y)
ceil(x, y)
Math.max(x, y)
JavaScript is the same as Java.
True
False
...
False
How can you detect the client's browser name?
client.navName
navigator.appName
browser.name
navigator.appName
Which event occurs when the user clicks on an HTML element?
onclick
onchange
onmouseclick
onclick
Which operator is used to assign a value to a variable?
*
=
+
=
